businesslayer

Class TitleBusinessLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • businesslayer.TitleBusinessLogic

  • public class TitleBusinessLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the business logic for adding, deleting, updating, titles to/from the database as part of the business layer.
    Version:
    1.0.0 March 30, 2015
    Author:
    Richard Barney

      • validateString

        private void validateString(java.lang.String value,
                            java.lang.String fieldName,
                            int maxLength,
                            boolean isNullAllowed)
                     throws ValidationException
        Void method that validates a String.
        Parameters:
        value - String containing the actual data.
        fieldName - the name of the field being validated (ISBN, Title, etc.).
        maxLength - the max length of the String.
        isNullAllowed - boolean to determine if a null field is allowed.
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if data is incorrect.

      • validateISBN

        private void validateISBN(Title title)
                   throws ValidationException
        Void method that validates the ISBN to make sure a duplicate ISBN is not entered.
        Parameters:
        title - Title object.
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if data is incorrect.

      • validateTitle

        private void validateTitle(Title title)
                    throws ValidationException
        Void method that calls validateString and validateInt methods, passing the Title object to these methods for validation.
        Parameters:
        title - Title object
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if data is incorrect.
